data.title: Roland Pro A/V - V-1HD
data.meta_description: V-1HD: HD Video Switcher - Portable Compact HD Switcher
data.text:
Portable Compact HD Switcher

The V-1HD makes it easy to connect and switch video cameras, smartphones, computers, tablets, Blu-ray players, and other HDMI video sources with a simple push of a button or slide of the T-Fader.

4 HDMI inputs

Supports up to Full HD 1080p

Easy-to-use interface

Full 12-channel audio mixer included

Easy to operate with hardware controls

Two HDMI outputs

Picture-in-picture and split functions

Two EFFECTS knobs deliver genuine visual performance

Remote control via USB or MIDI connection

Software control using V-1HD RCS Application for Mac, PC, and iPad

System Program Version 2.0

System Program Version 2.0 is a free update for the popular V-1HD HDMI video switcher including the companion Remote Control Software version 2.0 for Windows & macOS. Version 2.0 expands picture-in-picture effects with a new 1/3 sizing option. Turn on Auto Scan for hands-free switching. Numerous user interface improvements include the ability to view audio level meters on the multi-viewer, panel lock, and quickly reset system values by holding the WIPE button.

Download Current Version

A Standard That Set the Standard

The V-1HD has set the standard in 4-channel HDMI video switching. The highly successful V-1HD is used to create webcasts, live performances, sports production, presentations, conferences, house of worship services, and training curriculum. With a variety of HDMI sources, the V-1HD seamlessly mixes cameras, computers, tablets, media players, and game consoles in 1080p HD.

V-1HD Connectivity

The V-1HD includes all HDMI connectivity to keep workflows economical, simple, and flexible. Nearly all modern cameras and digital video devices use HDMI—the most common A/V connector on the planet. The V-1HD seamlessly mixes four HDMI sources, video cameras, action cameras, PC/Mac, and more with Full HD support, even when the sources are mismatched, interlaced, or progressive.

On-screen display of the Preview Out.

Simple Interface

The V-1HD sets a new benchmark in simple-to-use interfaces for setup and control. Connect an HDMI monitor to the multi-viewer preview output. Basic operation requires just a few buttons and the T-Fader, the most recognizable video switcher interface for amateurs and professionals alike. Large broadcast-style back-lit buttons ease video switching in low light conditions. Meanwhile, output fade dials in smooth, fast fades to black or white.

Visual Effects

Video effects, layers, and graphics add polish and excitement to any production. The V-1HD has a three-layer effects engine, so you can create picture-in-picture composition and split screen function. Plus, combine Chroma/Luminance keying with visual effects like silhouette, colorpass, and negative to keep audiences engaged and entertained.

Audio

The V-1HD might be small, but its powerful 12-channel digital audio mixer fits effortlessly into any live production environment. Mix embedded audio from all four HDMI channels with a stereo line-level or mic level input. Each audio input channel features delay, EQ, reverb, and mastering effects on all outputs, including both HDMIs and stereo RCA connection. Therefore, the V-1HD replaces many standalone sound processing racks.

Mastering function adjusts the sound balance of each frequency band.

Automated Video Switching

The V-1HD makes your job easier with two technology-assisted automatic switching modes. Input Scan switches sources in a range of 1–120 seconds in sequence. Beats Per Minute (BPM) Sync is also available, automatically switching Preview and Program at a specified song tempo.

Two Video Outputs

Two independent HDMI outputs are available. One output can be assigned to display one of three different video busses, providing the versatility needed for professional production. For example, use one as the main program output for a projector/monitor, recorder, or livestream. The second output may be used to split the main program output, turn any HD video monitor into an “up-next” input preview display, or show a four-way multi-viewer preview screen.

V-1HD Remote Control

The dedicated V-1HD remote control app turns an iPad into an efficient touch interface. You can also use the PC/Mac Remote Control Software to run essential switching functions, mix audio with virtual faders, change settings and effect parameters quickly, and create up to eight custom scenes for fast, efficient setup changes.

Panel Design

Front

Rear

Video

Video Processing

4:2:2(Y/Pb/Pr), 8-bit

Input Connectors

HDMI INPUT 1-4: Type A(19pins)x 4 *HDCP Supported

Output Connectors

HDMI OUTPUT: Type A(19pins) / HDMI PREVIEW: Type A(19pins) *HDCP Supported

Input Formats

HDMI: 720/59.94p,720/50p(FORMAT switch = 720p)

HDMI: 1080/59.94i,1080/50i,1080/59.94p,

1080/50p(FORMAT switch = 1080i or 1080p)

*The input interlaced video signal is converted to progressive video signal by internal processing.

*The video signal frame rate is selected by SETUP parameters (59.94 or 50).

Output Formats

HDMI: 720/59.94p,720/50p(FORMAT switch = 720p)

HDMI: 1080/59.94i,1080/50i(FORMAT switch = 1080i)

HDMI: 1080/59.94p,1080/50p(FORMAT switch = 1080p)

*The video signal frame rate is selected by SETUP parameters (59.94 or 50).

Video Effects

Transition: CUT, MIX (DISSOLVE/FAM/NAM/MOSAIC), WIPE (30 types),

TRANSFORMER(11 types)

EFFECTS: NEGATIVE, EMBOSS, COLORIZE, COLORPASS, POSTERIZE, SILHOUETTE,

MONOCOLOR, FINDEDGE, FLIP, WH-LUMIKEY@, BK-LUMIKEY@,

GR-CHROMAKEY@, BL-CHROMAKEY@, PinP(1/4)@, PinP(1/3)@, PinP(1/2)@,

SPLIT(H-STRETCH)@. SPLIT(H-CENTER)@, SPLIT(V-STRETCH)@,

SPLIT(V-CENTER)@

*@ marked Effects are effected common to A-BUS and B-BUS.

Audio

Audio Processing

Sampling rate: 24bit/48kHz

Input Connectors

Digital: HDMI INPUT 1–4 (19 pins) x 4

Analog: AUDIO IN (RCA pin type), MIC (Stereo mini type, plug-in power supported)

Output Connectors

Digital: HDMI OUTPUT (HDMI Type A 19 pins), HDMI PREVIEW (HDMI Type A 19 pins)

Analog: AUDIO OUT (RCA pin type), PHONES (Stereo mini type)

Input Level

AUDIO IN: -10 dBu (Maximum : +8 dBu), MIC: -41 – -13dBu (Maximum : -1 dBu)

Input Impedance

AUDIO IN: 15 k ohms, MIC:10 k ohms

Output Level

AUDIO OUT: -10 dBu (Maximum : +8 dBu), PHONES: 72mW + 72mW (32 ohms)

Output Impedance

AUDIO OUT: 1k ohms, PHONES: 10 ohms

Audio Effects

EQ, Delay, Compressor, HPF, Gate, Reverb, Mastering effect

Others

Other Connectors

USB: B Type (for remote control from PC), MIDI: IN, OUT/THRU

Other Functions

MEMORY (8 types), FREEZE (input video captured),

BPM SYNC (auto transition synchronized to tempo), OUTPUT FADE (WHITE/BLACK/AUDIO)

Power Supply

AC adaptor

Current Draw

1.5A

Power Consumption

18W

Dimensions

313 (W) x 102 (D) x 59 (H) mm / 12-1/3 (W) x 4 (D) x 2-1/3 (H) inches

Weight

1.2 kg (excluding AC adaptor) 2 lbs 10-2/5 oz

Accessories

Owner’s Manual, AC Adaptor, Power Cord, Cord Hook

V-1HD Applications

The user-friendly Roland V-1HD video switcher takes the stress out of managing event display and audio. Compact and portable, this ultra-durable switcher makes it easy to connect and switch a wide range of HDMI devices with just the push of a button or slide of the T-Fader.Read more…

V-Series Livestreaming Bundles

Livestreaming bundles include a V-Series HD video switcher and the UVC-01 USB video capture device and are available in Canada, United States, Mexico and Latin America.Read more…
